entry.key: <jaxrs:server xmlns:jaxrs="http://cxf.apache.org/jaxrs" xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans" id="customerService" address="/customerService"> <jaxrs:serviceBeans> <bean class="cn.itcast.cxf.service.CustomerServiceImpl" lazy-init="default" autowire="default" autowire-candidate="default" /> </jaxrs:serviceBeans> </jaxrs:server>
